issue.title: [C++] move BitsetStack to bit-util.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4707](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4707). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
BitsetStack was written for use in the JSON parser, but it's useful enough that it should be made available in bit-util.h

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4707?focusedCommentId=16784002) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
